name: Summoner's Tale
description:
What is Summoner's Tales

Summoner's Tale is a card game that works around strategy to defeat the enemy, use multiple cards with different traits to make sure you rule the board as you wish.

Summon multiple powerful creatures and allies to help you in the journey of beating the enemy army!

But be careful the enemy is powerful and smart as well!

Controls:
  • Mouse Left Click  - move the cards
  • Mouse Right Click  - zoom in (Cards/creatures)
Tutorial:

To start playing Summoner's Tale first you have to open the game and press Play!

After that, the game works with a Turn Based System that goes as follows:

Summoning Phase -> Select Phase -> Damage Phase -> End of Turn. Summoning Phase:

Its the first phase of every turn and the only phase where you can summon your creatures (be sure to check your mana before trying to summon since if you don't have enough mana nothing will happen!) If you don't want to summon you can just skip it

Select Phase:

In this phase  you can select which creature you want to use to attack the enemy, be aware that every combat is a TRADE! (You and the enemy will both take damage so make sure you choose the right targets with the right creature).

Damage Phase:

This phase is where the fun happens and the creature takes damage and attack eachother

End of Turn:

The turns ends and it's the AI turn to play.

Thats it! Have fun and I hope to see you guys on my next game!
